Info.hello: Hello, I'm a software engineer based in Brazil!

Work.title: Work
Work.description: I'm passionate about building beautiful and responsive interfaces and amazing user experiences. I've worked with various clients and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver successful projects. My last big project was to fully develop and deploy the interface of a credit card related platform for <vexLink>VExpenses</vexLink>, a startup focused on managing corporate expense reimbursements. Also, my <ghLink>GitHub</ghLink> profile contains more than 100 repositories of side projects I have built along the way.

Bio.title: Bio
Bio.gostack: Completed the GoStack bootcamp program by Rocketseat.
Bio.unifacef: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering at Franca's Municipal University Center (Uni-FACEF).
Bio.ignite: Completed the Ignite React bootcamp program by Rocketseat.

Interests.title: I ♥
Interests.description: When I'm not coding, I like to hang out with my friends, go to the gym, play soccer, watch TV shows and movies, and play video games.

Socials.title: My socials
Socials.thumbnailAlt: A YouTube thumbnail written "Renato Marques, a software engineer"

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Feel free to get in touch with me.

Professional.title: Professional Works
Professional.vexCardsAlt: Two blue credit cards crossing each other, showing their front and back sides
Professional.vexCardsDescription: A credit card services platform for a startup focused on managing corporate expense reimbursement.
Professional.vexUIAlt: The VExpenses logo with a search input under it written "Find components"
Professional.vexUIDescription: A React UI components library following the VExpenses Design System.

FrontEnd.coffeeAlt: A black and white cup written Coffe Delivery and coffee seeds around it
FrontEnd.coffeeDescription: A coffee shop delivery from the products list to the checkout and success pages.
FrontEnd.adminDashboardAlt: Dark blue background with a search bar on the top with some white icons, it's written "Dashboard" on the center and there is a purple button under it written "Download reports".
FrontEnd.adminDashboardDescription: Admin dashboard with charts, tables and forms.
FrontEnd.igniteUIAlt: The Storybook logo with a search input under it written "Find components"
FrontEnd.igniteUIDescription: Design System packages built and release on NPM to be installed and used in other projects.
FrontEnd.uploadAIAlt: A light background with the logo upload.ai on the top left and an empty text box under it.
FrontEnd.uploadAIDescription: AI app to generate titles and descriptions for YouTube videos.

Mobile.restaurantDeliveryAlt: A dark blue background with a white text written "Your Cart" and a picture of a hamburger under it with the title "X-React" and a description.
Mobile.restaurantDeliveryDescription: This app shows the menu of a restaurant and allow customers to make their order and send it through WhatsApp.
Mobile.dailyDietAlt: A white background with the logo written "Daily Diet" an user avatar on the right and in the certer a green box with a percentage in black "55.56%".
Mobile.dailyDietDescription: This app tracks your daily meals to help you stick to your diet.
Mobile.teamsAlt: A dark background with a logo that is an icon with a green rocket inside a shield and 3 gold stars above it. On the center it's written "Teams - Play with your team".
Mobile.teamsDescription: This app is designed for gamers to manage their teams to play online.

Web3.title: On the Web 3.0
Web3.paperhandsAlt: A dark background with a yellow glowing eye written "Paperhands Tracker" under it
Web3.paperhandsDescription: A blockchain contract transaction tracker that checks for "paperhands".
Web3.anubisAlt: A 3D typography written "Anubis Rush" in purple and yellow with a dark purple background
Web3.anubisDescription: Game developed for the Game Jam competition at the GodsGame NFT community.
Web3.hycAlt: A purple background with a white "H" as the logo and it's written "Hold Your Crypto" in white under the logo
Web3.hycDescription: Mobile App that helps people keep track of their crypto investments.
Web3.cryptwitterAlt: A white background written "CrypTwitter" in black and a blue button with a fox icon and it's written "Connect with MetaMask"
Web3.cryptwitterDescription: Web3 version of Twitter's timeline, on the blockchain.
